TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates trigger conditions for a buffer queue trigger.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMedia.CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition WhenBufferCountBecomesGreaterThan = int32(11)

Docs.summary: The trigger is raised when the buffer count is greater than the specified value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMedia.CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition WhenBufferCountBecomesLessThan = int32(10)

Docs.summary: The trigger is raised when the buffer count is less than the specified value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMedia.CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition WhenDataBecomesReady = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The trigger is raised when the data is ready.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMedia.CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition WhenDurationBecomesGreaterThan = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The trigger is raised when the elapsed time is greater than the specified value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMedia.CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition WhenDurationBecomesGreaterThanOrEqualTo = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The trigger is raised when the elapsed time is greater than or equal to the specified value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMedia.CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition WhenDurationBecomesGreaterThanOrEqualToAndBufferCountBecomesGreaterThan = int32(12)

Docs.summary: The trigger is raised when the elapsed time is greater than or equal to its specified value and the elapsed time is greater than its specified value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMedia.CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition WhenDurationBecomesLessThan = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The trigger is raised when the elapsed time becomes less than the specified value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMedia.CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition WhenDurationBecomesLessThanOrEqualTo = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The trigger is raised when the elapsed time becomes less than or equal to the specified value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMedia.CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition WhenEndOfDataReached = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The trigger is raised when the end of the data is reached.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMedia.CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition WhenMaxPresentationTimeStampChanges = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The trigger is raised when the maximum presentation time stamp changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMedia.CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition WhenMinPresentationTimeStampChanges = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The trigger is raised when the minimum presentation time stamp changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMedia.CMBufferQueue/TriggerCondition WhenReset = int32(9)

Docs.summary: The trigger is raised when the buffer queue is reset.
